art_direction: A comic noir, cel-shaded horror story set in a haunted prison during a storm. The art features dramatic, high-contrast black and white lighting from lightning flashes, with a close third-person perspective creating a claustrophobic feel.

scenes.title: The Iron Slam
scenes.text: The storm hit fast. Elias and Lena ducked inside the abandoned prison. A bolt of lightning lit the sky. The massive iron gate slammed shut behind them. The lock groaned. They were trapped. The emergency lights flickered. Then died.
scenes.image_prompt: Elias and Lena stand in the dark entrance hall of a derelict prison. A massive, barred gate is visible behind them, sealed shut. The only light is a faint glow from a phone held by Elias, illuminating their panicked faces. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: A Block
scenes.text: They moved deeper. The phone's light cut a weak path. They entered a long cellblock. Iron bars lined both sides. Lightning flashed, flooding the hall with white light. A tall, gaunt figure stood at the far end. The light died. Something grabbed Lena. She screamed once. Then silence.
scenes.image_prompt: Looking down a long, two-tiered prison cellblock. A flash of lightning outside the high, barred windows starkly illuminates a tall, skeletal figure standing at the far end of the corridor. Elias is in the foreground, his back partially to the camera. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

choices.text: Find a way to open the main gate.

scenes.title: Her Voice
scenes.text: Elias yelled her name. Only the storm answered. He waited. A floorboard creaked above. Then, a soft whimper. It came from a door marked 'Infirmary.' But another sound, a rhythmic scraping, came from the guards' locker room down the hall.
scenes.image_prompt: Elias stands in a dark prison corridor at a junction. To his left, a door with a faded 'INFIRMARY' sign is slightly ajar. To his right, a door labeled 'LOCKER ROOM' is closed tight. He is looking towards the infirmary door. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: Sick Room
scenes.text: He pushed into the infirmary. Rusted beds and overturned equipment littered the room. A patient file lay open on a desk. The text was mostly faded. 'Subject... shows amplification.' A loud, metallic clang came from a steel door at the back of the room. The morgue.
scenes.image_prompt: Inside the prison infirmary, surrounded by overturned gurneys. Elias reads an old, yellowed patient file on a dusty desk. In the background, a heavy steel door marked 'MORGUE' is the center of focus. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

choices.text: This is a trap. Get out.

scenes.title: The Cold Table
scenes.text: The morgue door was heavy. It groaned open. Lena stood inside, next to a steel autopsy table. She turned slowly. Her eyes were empty. A black, spiral brand was burned onto her forearm. "He's waiting," she said. Her voice was not her own.
scenes.image_prompt: Lena stands in the stark, tiled prison morgue. Her back is to a metal slab. She faces Elias, her expression blank. A dark, spiral-shaped brand is clearly visible on her forearm. The light catches the cold metal surfaces. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: The New Guard
scenes.text: She lunged. Her grip was like iron. He couldn't fight back. The world went dark. He felt a searing pain on his own skin. The Warden's Mark burned into him. He was part of the prison now. A guard for the damned. He heard their whispers.
scenes.image_prompt: A close-up on Elias's hand, pinned to a stone floor. Another hand, with the black spiral brand, grips his wrist tightly. The brand is beginning to burn itself onto his skin, glowing faintly. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: Wrong Turn
scenes.text: The cold from the morgue was unnatural. A deep, predatory dread. This was a trap. Elias backed out of the infirmary, closing the door softly. He abandoned the search for Lena. He had to get out. The main security office had to have gate controls.
scenes.image_prompt: Elias is backing away from the infirmary door, his hand still on the knob. His face is a mask of fear and realization. He looks down the dark corridor toward a set of stairs leading up. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: The Glass Cage
scenes.text: He found the security office. A cage of dusty glass and dead monitors. Strange, spiral symbols were painted on the walls in what looked like dried blood. An old radio on the console crackled. It hissed with static.
scenes.image_prompt: Inside a prison control room. Banks of dead monitors line the wall. Elias stares at a large, rust-colored spiral symbol painted on the main glass window overlooking the cellblocks. A vintage radio on the console in the foreground has a soft static glow. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: Static Offer
scenes.text: A voice congealed from the static. It was old and cruel. "You feel their rage. This prison hums with it. That power can be yours. Serve me. Keep them in line. Accept my mark."
scenes.image_prompt: A close-up of Elias's face, illuminated by the dim light of the radio's vacuum tubes. His expression is one of terror and temptation as he listens intently. The static seems to form whispering shapes in the air around the radio. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: The Warden's Heir
scenes.text: Elias whispered, "Yes." Pain, white-hot, shot through his hand. The spiral mark burned itself into his palm. The radio went silent. He could hear the thoughts of the prisoners. Their anger. Their hate. He was their keeper now. Forever.
scenes.image_prompt: Elias clutches his right hand in agony, falling to his knees. A glowing, black spiral mark is seared into his palm. The radio on the console behind him is now dark and silent. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: Defiance
scenes.text: Elias yelled, "No!" The voice in the radio shrieked. The radio exploded in a shower of sparks. The concussion knocked a peeling prison map from the wall. Behind it, a dark seam in the concrete. A hidden door.
scenes.image_prompt: The radio on the control panel is shattered, smoke rising from it. Elias is shielding his face. On the back wall, a large, old map has fallen to the floor, revealing the outline of a hidden door in the concrete. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: The Engine
scenes.text: The door opened into a small, stone chamber. Thick cables ran like veins across the floor, converging on a grotesque device. It was a heart of metal and wire, pulsing with a sick, rhythmic light. Shadowy figures of inmates flickered at the edge of the room. They turned toward him.
scenes.image_prompt: In a secret, stone-walled basement, a pulsating mechanical heart made of gears and wires sits on a pedestal in the center. Thick black cables snake across the floor to it. Vague, shadowy figures of prisoners watch Elias from the dark corners of the room. A fire axe hangs on the wall to the right. Wire cutters sit on a bench to the left. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

choices.text: Smash the heart with the fire axe.

scenes.title: Shattered Heart
scenes.text: He grabbed the fire axe from the wall. He swung it with all his strength. Metal screamed against metal. The heart shattered. A wave of pure, silent light erupted from it. The shadowy figures dissolved into dust. The storm outside ceased. Silence. The front gates of the prison creaked open.
scenes.image_prompt: Elias stands over the destroyed mechanical heart, holding a fire axe. The heart is in pieces, emitting a final, brilliant white light that banishes the shadows. Through a high window, the storm clouds are parting. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: Blackout
scenes.text: He saw heavy wire cutters on a workbench. He snatched them up and severed the thickest cable feeding the device. The pulsing heart flared violently. The room flashed white. The stone ceiling groaned, then cracked. Then everything came down in a roar of collapsing rock and metal.
scenes.image_prompt: A massive electrical arc explodes from the main power cable as Elias cuts it with wire cutters. The mechanical heart in the background glows white-hot, and large cracks are spreading across the stone ceiling above. Debris begins to fall. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.

scenes.title: Locked Away
scenes.text: He chose the locker room. The scraping was louder now. He pushed the door open. The room was empty, except for Lena's phone lying on the floor. He stepped inside to grab it. The heavy door slammed shut behind him. The lock clicked. He was in a cell. The scraping started again, just outside the door.
scenes.image_prompt: Elias is trapped inside a small, dark room with lockers. His hands are on the heavy steel door, trying to push it open. A small, barred window in the door shows only darkness. Lena's phone lies on the floor, its screen cracked and dark. Comic noir, cel-shaded contrast, graphic novel style, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, dramatic storm lightning, flash illumination, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain.
